name: UIDT v3.5.6: Unified Information-Density Theory - Canonical Framework
description: The UIDT v3.5.6 software suite provides the canonical implementation and verification environment for the Unified Information-Density Theory. It includes the Python solver for the parameter-free derivation of the Yang-Mills Mass Gap (1.710 GeV) and the Universal Gamma Invariant (16.339). The suite simulates the 99-step Renormalization Group (RG) cascade for vacuum energy suppression and calibrates cosmological observables (H0, S8, w(z)) against 2025 DESI DR2 and JWST data. Includes the 'Three-Pillar Architecture' validation logic.
citation: Rietz, P. (2025). Unified Information-Density Theory v3.5.6: Vacuum Information Density as the Fundamental Geometric Scalar. Zenodo. DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.17835200
